item.title: Nippin’ into Nara
item.description: On our way to Osaka we popped into Nara for one reason only – to see some deer! It took over 1 hour from Kyoto to arrive by local train. We threw our bags into a locker at the train station and spent a couple of hours sightseeing. According to Shinto legend the deer are considered to be messengers of god and have since been considered a national treasure. It didn’t take long till we met a bunch of deers, freely roaming around.
